roleset.name: produce light
roleset.note: SHINE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls light_emission-43.1. (from shine.01-v)

example.name: agentive
example.text: Currently, chips are produced by *trace* shining light through a mask to produce an image on the chip, much as a camera produces an image on film.
example.arg: to produce an image on the chip, much as a camera produces an image on film

example.name: ergative
example.text: Rising in the firm, he became powerful and bland, though his new wife, Susan, made him shine in the gossip columns with her profligate spending habits and flamboyant frocks.
example.arg: with her profligate spending habits and flamboyant frocks

example.name: a particular kind of direction
example.text: But while the merits of diversification shine through when times are tough, there's also a price to pay: A diversified portfolio always underperforms an undiversified portfolio during those times when the investment in the undiversified portfolio is truly hot.
